  <p>I am a first year graduate student in the [Department of Atmospheric and Environmental Sciences](https://www.albany.edu/atmos/){target="_blank"} at the University at Albany, studying the impact of midlatitude cyclogenesis on downstream predictability under the advisement of [Professor Ryan Torn](https://www.albany.edu/atmos/ryan-torn.php){target="_blank"}. My research interests are related to large-scale atmospheric circulations and extreme precipitation events. I'm also passionate about computational reproducibility in science.</p>
